title: BRIEF-SugarBud Enters Supply Agreement With Adastra Labs
text:
BRIEF-SugarBud Enters Supply Agreement With Adastra Labs

Stock Markets 46 minutes ago (Sep 16, 2019 07:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-SugarBud Enters Supply Agreement With Adastra Labs Sept 16 (Reuters) - SugarBud Craft Growers Corp : * SUGARBUD ENTERS SUPPLY AGREEMENT WITH ADASTRA LABS * SUGARBUD CRAFT GROWERS CORP - HAS ENTERED INTO AN AGREEMENT WITH ADASTRA LABS HOLDING TO SUPPLY DRIED FLOWER AND TRIM FOR USE IN EXTRACTION * SUGARBUD CRAFT GROWERS CORP - IN DEAL, WILL SUPPLY ADASTRA MINIMUM OF 900,000 GRAMS OF DRIED CANNABIS FLOWER AND TRIM OVER A PERIOD OF NINE MONTHS

BRIEF-SugarBud Enters Supply Agreement With Adastra Labs
description: BRIEF-SugarBud Enters Supply Agreement With Adastra Labs
